Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer --Updated for R15 avatars by StarWars
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
BaseUrl = "rbxassetid://"
AnimationsFolder = Tool.Animations
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
BaseOrb = BasePart:Clone() BaseOrb.Name = "Orb" BaseOrb.Transparency = 0 BaseOrb.Reflectance = 0.5 BaseOrb.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Teal") BaseOrb.Material = Enum.Material.Ice BaseOrb.CanCollide = false OrbMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") OrbMesh.Name = "Mesh" OrbMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Sphere OrbMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 1.5) OrbMesh.Parent = BaseOrb FirePart = BasePart:Clone() FirePart.Name = "FirePart" FirePart.Transparency = 0 FirePart.Reflectance = 0.5 FirePart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Teal") FirePart.Material = Enum.Material.Ice FirePart.CanCollide = false OrbFire = Instance.new("Fire") OrbFire.Name = "Fire" OrbFire.Color = Color3.new((0 / 255), (170 / 255), (255 / 255)) OrbFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new((85 / 255), (255 / 255), (255 / 255)) OrbFire.Enabled = true OrbFire.Parent = FirePart OrbLight = Instance.new("PointLight") OrbLight.Name = "Light" OrbLight.Color = BaseOrb.BrickColor.Color OrbLight.Shadows = false OrbLight.Brightness = 50 OrbLight.Parent = BaseOrb FireMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") FireMesh.Name = "Mesh" FireMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh FireMesh.MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "25212400") FireMesh.Parent = FirePart FirePart.Parent = BaseOrb FireWeld = Instance.new("Weld") FireWeld.Part0 = BaseOrb FireWeld.Part1 = FirePart FireWeld.Parent = BaseOrb
DefaultOrbSize = 0.5 MaxOrbSize = 5
Damage = { Min = 15, Max = 100 }
DefaultOrbVelocity = 30 MaxOrbVelocity = 200
MaxCharge = 6
Animations = { Equip = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R6:WaitForChild("Equip"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, Fire = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R6:WaitForChild("Fire"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 4, Duration = 1}, Charge = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R6:WaitForChild("Charge"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = (1 / MaxCharge), Duration = MaxCharge}, HoldCharge = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R6:WaitForChild("HoldCharge"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, CastSpell = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R6:WaitForChild("CastSpell"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 0.5, Duration = nil},
R15Equip = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R15:WaitForChild("Equip"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, R15Fire = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R15:WaitForChild("Fire"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 4, Duration = 1}, R15Charge = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R15:WaitForChild("Charge"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = (1 / MaxCharge), Duration = MaxCharge}, R15HoldCharge = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R15:WaitForChild("HoldCharge"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, R15CastSpell = {Animation = AnimationsFolder.R15:WaitForChild("CastSpell"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 0.5, Duration = nil}, }
Sounds = { Blast = Handle:WaitForChild("Blast"), }
ToolEquipped = false MouseDown = false
Gravity = workspace.Gravity Rate = (1 / 60) ReloadTime = 1
Tool.Enabled = true
function GetPercentage(Start, End, Number) return (((Number - Start) / (End - Start)) * 100) end
function Round(Number, RoundDecimal) local WholeNumber, Decimal = math.modf(Number) return ((Decimal >= RoundDecimal and math.ceil(Number)) or (Decimal < RoundDecimal and math.floor(Number))) end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Player and Player.Parent and Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Spawn(function() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("Preload", v.Animation.AnimationId) end end) Spawn(function() local Animation = Animations.Equip if Humanoid and Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then Animation = Animations.R15Equip end InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) end) MouseDown = false ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() MouseDown = false if FullyChargedIndicator and FullyChargedIndicator.Parent then FullyChargedIndicator:Destroy() end Spawn(function() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end end) ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function OnServerInvoke(player, Mode, Value) if player ~= Player or not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end if Mode == "MouseClick" then local Down = Value.Down if Down and not MouseDown and Tool.Enabled then Spawn(function() MouseDown = true ChargeTick = tick() local Animation = Animations.Charge if Humanoid and Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then Animation = Animations.R15Charge end InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) while MouseDown and ToolEquipped and CheckIfAlive() and (tick() - ChargeTick) < MaxCharge do wait(Rate) end if MouseDown and ToolEquipped and CheckIfAlive() then for i, v in pairs(Handle:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v:Destroy() end end FullyChargedIndicator = BasePart:Clone() FullyChargedIndicator.Transparency = 1 FullyChargedIndicator.CanCollide = false local Sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") Sparkles.SparkleColor = BrickColor.new("Teal").Color Sparkles.Enabled = true Sparkles.Parent = FullyChargedIndicator local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = Color3.new((0 / 255), (170 / 255), (255 / 255)) Fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new((85 / 255), (255 / 255), (255 / 255)) Fire.Heat = 10 Fire.Size = 2 Fire.Enabled = true Fire.Parent = FullyChargedIndicator local Light = Instance.new("PointLight") Light.Color = BrickColor.new("Teal").Color Light.Brightness = 2 Light.Range = 8 Light.Shadows = false Light.Enabled = true Light.Parent = FullyChargedIndicator local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Handle Weld.Part1 = FullyChargedIndicator Weld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, ((Handle.Size.Y * 0.5) - (FullyChargedIndicator.Size.Y * 0.5)), 0) Weld.Parent = FullyChargedIndicator FullyChargedIndicator.Parent = Handle local Animation = Animations.HoldCharge if Humanoid and Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then Animation = Animations.R15HoldCharge end InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) end end) elseif not Down and MouseDown then MouseDown = false if not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() then return end Tool.Enabled = false if FullyChargedIndicator and FullyChargedIndicator.Parent then FullyChargedIndicator:Destroy() end local TickTime = (tick() - ChargeTick) local ChargePercentage = math.clamp(GetPercentage(0, MaxCharge, (tick() - ChargeTick)), 0, 100) local ChargePercentageToDecimal = (ChargePercentage * 0.01) local OrbSize = math.clamp((MaxOrbSize * ChargePercentageToDecimal), DefaultOrbSize, MaxOrbSize) local OrbVelocity = math.clamp((MaxOrbVelocity * ChargePercentageToDecimal), DefaultOrbVelocity, MaxOrbVelocity) local OrbDamage = math.clamp((Damage.Max * ChargePercentageToDecimal), Damage.Min, Damage.Max) local MousePosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition").Position if Humanoid then if Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R6 then InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animations.Charge) InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animations.HoldCharge) InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.Fire) elseif Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animations.R15Charge) InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animations.R15HoldCharge) InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.R15Fire) end end Sounds.Blast:Play() Spawn(function() local Orb = BaseOrb:Clone() Orb.Size = Vector3.new(OrbSize, OrbSize, OrbSize) Orb.FirePart.Mesh.Scale = ((Orb.Size * 0.5)) + Vector3.new(0, (Orb.Size.Y * 0.25), 0) Orb.FirePart.Fire.Heat = math.clamp((25 * ChargePercentageToDecimal), 0, 25) Orb.FirePart.Fire.Size = math.clamp((10 * ChargePercentageToDecimal), 0, 10) Orb.Light.Range = math.clamp((MaxOrbSize * ChargePercentageToDecimal), 3, MaxOrbSize) Orb.Weld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -(Orb.Size.Y + 0.1), 0) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi, 0, 0) local OrbCFrame = (Handle.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, ((Handle.Size.Y * 0.5) - ((OrbSize * 0.5) * 1--[[.5]])), -((Handle.Size.Z * 0.5) + ((OrbSize * 0.5) * 1.5)))) local Direction = CFrame.new(OrbCFrame.p, MousePosition) local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.cframe = (Direction * CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi * 0.5), 0, 0)) BodyGyro.Parent = Orb OrbVelocity = (Direction.lookVector * OrbVelocity) local Mass = ((Orb:GetMass() + Orb.FirePart:GetMass()) * Gravity) local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = OrbVelocity BodyVelocity.Parent = Orb Orb.Velocity = OrbVelocity Orb.CFrame = (Direction * CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), 0, 0)) Orb.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local character = Hit.Parent if character:IsA("Accessory") then character = character.Parent end if character == Character then return end local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character) if player and IsTeamMate(Player, player) then return end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(OrbDamage) if OrbDamage < Damage.Max and Orb and Orb.Parent then Orb:Destroy() end end end) Debris:AddItem(Orb, 5) Orb.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Spawn(function() while Orb and Orb.Parent do local RotatedCFrame = Orb.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 0.1, 0) BodyGyro.cframe = RotatedCFrame Orb.CFrame = RotatedCFrame wait(Rate) end end) end) wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = OnServerInvoke
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") RunService = game:GetService("RunService") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Animations = {} LocalObjects = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ToolEquipped = false
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Jump"):Connect(function() Humanoid.Jump = false end) end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") ToolEquipped = true if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = false}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) Mouse.Move:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseMove", {Position = Mouse.Hit.p, Target = Mouse.Target}) end) end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false LocalObjects = {} for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end for i, v in pairs({PreventJump, ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end Animations = {} end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) local ServerReturn pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) end) return ServerReturn end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "PlaySound" and value then value:Play() elseif mode == "StopSound" and value then value:Stop() elseif mode == "Preload" and value then Spawn(function() ContentProvider:Preload(value) end) elseif mode == "MousePosition" then return {Position = PlayerMouse.Hit.p, Target = PlayerMouse.Target} elseif mode == "DisableJump" then DisableJump(value) elseif mode == "SetLocalTransparencyModifier" and value and ToolEquipped then pcall(function() local ObjectFound = false for i, v in pairs(LocalObjects) do if v == value then ObjectFound = true end end if not ObjectFound then table.insert(LocalObjects, value) if ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier then ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier:disconnect() end ObjectLocalTransparencyModifier = RunService.RenderStepped:connect(function() for i, v in pairs(LocalObjects) do if v.Object and v.Object.Parent then local CurrentTransparency = v.Object.LocalTransparencyModifier if ((not v.AutoUpdate and (CurrentTransparency == 1 or CurrentTransparency == 0)) or v.AutoUpdate) then v.Object.LocalTransparencyModifier = v.Transparency end else table.remove(LocalObjects, i) end end end) end end) end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
Tool:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(UpdateIcon) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)
